name: ColorGroupSwatches

properties.name: length
properties.description: The number of objects in the collection.

parameters.name: swatchItemRef
parameters.description: swatch to be added to color group

parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.description: Initial values for properties of the new ColorGroupSwatch (Optional)

methods.name: count
methods.description: Displays the number of elements in the ColorGroupSwatch.

methods.name: item
methods.description: Returns the ColorGroupSwatch with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

methods.name: itemByID
methods.description: Returns the ColorGroupSwatch with the specified ID.

methods.name: itemByRange
methods.description: Returns the ColorGroupSwatches within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: The ColorGroupSwatch, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ColorGroupSwatch, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The ColorGroupSwatch, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ColorGroupSwatch, Long Integer or String.

methods.name: firstItem
methods.description: Returns the first ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

methods.name: lastItem
methods.description: Returns the last ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

methods.name: middleItem
methods.description: Returns the middle ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

methods.name: previousItem
methods.description: Returns the ColorGroupSwatch with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The index of the ColorGroupSwatch that follows the desired ColorGroupSwatch.

methods.name: nextItem
methods.description: Returns the ColorGroupSwatch whose index follows the specified ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.description: The ColorGroupSwatch whose index comes before the desired ColorGroupSwatch.

methods.name: anyItem
methods.description: Returns any ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

methods.name: everyItem
methods.description: Returns every ColorGroupSwatch in the collection.

methods.name: toSource
methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ColorGroupSwatch.
Returns the ColorGroupSwatch with the specified index.

description: A collection of color group swatches.
